summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of East Blaine Street from 19th Avenue North, to East Howe Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8957 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
